newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse closes slightly up.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse closes slightly up.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Wednesday closed slightly up in lower trade, bourse sources said.
The market's 30-share index closed at 618.25 from 617.87 on Tuesday.
Trade volume was 987,420 dinars against 1.304 million dinars.
BNDT bank was up 0.57 dinar to 29 dinars. Airliner Tunis Air up 0.28 dinar to 16.5 dinars.
Investment fund SPDIT was down 1.35 dinar to 43.65 dinars. ($=0.96 dinar)
